quotes.quote: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You’re going to be all right. You just stumbled over a stone in the road. It means nothing. Your goal lies far beyond this. Doesn’t it? I’m sure you’ll overcome this. You’ll walk again… soon.
quotes.author: Guts

quotes.quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something - your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren't used to an environment where excellence is expected.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Be nice to nerds. Chances are you’ll end up working for one.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can’t lose.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Hope is a waking dream.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: No great mind has ever existed without a touch of madness.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution; it represents the wise choice of many alternatives - choice, not chance, determines your destiny.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Anybody can become angry — that is easy, but to be angry with the right person and to the right degree and at the right time and for the right purpose, and in the right way — that is not within everybody's power and is not easy.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The educated differ from the uneducated as much as the living differ from the dead.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Poverty is the parent of revolution and crime.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster. And if you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There are no facts, only interpretations.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The snake which cannot cast its skin has to die. As well the minds which are prevented from changing their opinions; they cease to be mind.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: No one can construct for you the bridge upon which precisely you must cross the stream of life, no one but you yourself alone.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The surest way to corrupt a youth is to instruct him to hold in higher esteem those who think alike than those who think differently.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I choose a lazy person to do a hard job. Because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: If you can't make it good, at least make it look good.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Most people overestimate what they can do in one year and underestimate what they can do in ten years.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: If you give people tools, and they use their natural abilities and their curiosity, they will develop things in ways that will surprise you very much beyond what you might have expected.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Power comes not from knowledge kept but from knowledge shared.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The cruel injustice is that even though the world’s poor are doing essentially nothing to cause climate change, they’re going to suffer the most from it.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Some people may call me a nerd. I claim the label with pride.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: I believe that if you show people the problems and you show Them The Solutions They Will Be Moved To Act
quotes.author: Bill Gates
